name: 施陽正
objective: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一定律。
schedule:
週次(日期)　　　　　　　　　　　　進度
1 (9/20)　　　　Course Outline & Ch1: Introduction and Basic  Concepts
2 (9/27)　　　　Ch2: Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis, I
3 (10/04)　　　　Ch2: Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis, II
4 (10/11)　　　　Ch2: Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis, III
5 (10/18)　　　　Ch3: Properties of Pure Substances, I
6 (10/25)　　　　Ch3: Properties of Pure Substances, II
7 (11/01)　　　　Ch3: Properties of Pure Substances, III
8 (11/08)　　　　Mid-term Exam, I (第一次期中考)
9 (11/15)　　　　Ch4: Energy Analysis of Closed System, I
10 (11/22)　　Ch4: Energy Analysis of Closed System, II
11 (11/29)　　Ch4: Energy Analysis of Closed System, III
12 (12/06)　　Ch5: Mass and Energy Analysis of Control Volumes, I
13 (12/13)　　Mid-term Exam, II (第二次期中考)
14 (12/20)　　Ch5: Mass and Energy Analysis of Control Volumes, II
15 (12/27)　　Ch5: Mass and Energy Analysis of Control Volumes, III
16 (01/03)　　Ch6: The Second Law of Thermodynamics, I

scorePolicy:
作業 10%、期中考 50% (兩次)、期末考 40%（包含本學期所教授全部範圍）。
注意：無故缺席達三次者，學期分數以零分計算。
materials:
教科書：
Cengel, Y.A., and M.A. Boles. 2006. “Thermodynamics : an engineering approach”. Fifth edition.
參考書籍：
1. M. J. Moran, and H. N. Shapiro, “Fundamentals of Engineering Thermodynamics,” 5th ed., 2004.
2. Sonntag, R.E., Borgnakke, C., and Van Wylen, G.J., “Fundamentals of Thermodynamics,” 6th ed., 2003.

Office Hours: 週一、四 15:00~18:00
